Apesar dos muitos bugs, o jogo é muito divertido. Se tornou meu principal jogo de partidas rápidas na mesma semana que comprei e recomendo para aqueles que gostam de grandes desafios. Sinto que aprendo mais a cada vez que jogo tanto de Killer, quanto de Survivor. Muitas coisas ainda precisam ser consertadas como, por exemplo, a hitbox e as desconexões inesperadas.
o jogo é divertido, mas depois de algumas horas fica enjoativo

É muitooooooooo bom vc ser o killer.
Coolest game...EVER play..But make sure you have friends to survive with you ..
Muito bom, jogar de killer é a melhor coisa que existe.

I give it 3.5 out of 5 stars it's a great game with A LOT of opinion but in my honest opinion my biggest problem is the devs listen to the community TOO much.. Now before you shoot me for saying a dev "listens" to the community. It's REALLY good for devs to listen to a community AT FIRST but for a game thats like dead by daylight everything is about balance. So what iv'e noticed is over the years there is a constant struggle between survivors that practically just want to be able to meme the killer. When they can't they all cry and complain until devs nerf everything into the ground. Then you have killers that just want to be able to chase down survivors with no skill or mind gaming involved and that's not fair either. So the devs seem to go in spouts where, either they nerf the killers to the ground IE. Nurse is unplayable now freddy is unplayable now- so many unplayable killers with constant looping I really only see a select few of top tier streamers who can run all killers efficiently. Also hacking is a relative issue you can do a simple google search and find hacks readily available. The devs are dead silent on it as well which leads me to the idea that they do nothing about it. Overall though this game is SO great and I love the game itself just would be nice to see the devs try to stay in a non biased stance and look at balance changes that make the game BALANCED it will never be 100% balanced but they need to stop listening to the whiny community
fun game, just wish you didnt have to buy nearly all killers and survivors
на любителя, но мне нравиться убивать людей)
No chyba spoko w sensie, że można naprawić generator i np zwalić paletę i ogólnie całkiem fajnie.
Esse jogo é simplesmente maravilhoso, é definitivamente o melhor fan service para pessoas que amam filmes de terror

Игруля хорошая, но конешно же баги баги баги. Но не только же плохие впечатления, но и хорошие. Бывают конешно ситуации, в которых есть какая-нибудь "киберкотлетка" которая приседает и щёлкает фонарём и сливается за 30 секунд при этом закидывая тебе в профиль -rep tunneling camping и т. д. Но и встречаются игроки которые реально могут тебя отбегать 2-3 геника таким можно и на рот закинуть ой +rep в профиль. Ну в итоге я советую эту игру и главный совет не донатье в неё в начале это никак не поможет прокачаться, поиграйте в неё несколько дней и сами для себя решите донатить или нет.
一开始玩很恐怖  玩着玩着就是娱乐游戏
O jogo é legal e divertido, recomendo. Muito bom de jogar com os amigos.

Fun for a little while but then quickly drops off due to how unfair the game is to new players. The game is also riddled with bugs, I was barely even able to play the game because of a bug that's been in it since launch. Matchmaking is also incredibly unfair especially if you're a new player, I got placed multiple times against ranks 1-4 as a rank 19.
It's a game and a half
Good game, would recommend this game if you can control your rage and much better fun with friends.

This game is shit right now. It's way better than it was, however if you're going to buy this game, you'll want to know (September 2020):
- The developers are money hungry little whores who can't code.

- This game is pretty much only fun with friends.

- You can get stuck in multiple places within a map and unable to move.

- Veteran players are going to insult you and call you shit at the game, taunt you mid chase, ect.

- If you're playing this game enough you can get all the good killers for free

- This game IS balanced.............. very fucking poorly

- Updates often bring very noticeable and possibly game breaking bugs

- To add get them to join your lobby, you have to restart your game

- People disconnect if you bring in a Mori

- The community is toxic (at best)

- The official dead by daylight discord is somehow PG even though the game covers mature content (also the owner is a cheater)

- A very fun game but the devs fucked it to oblivion.

This game is moderately better than it was at the time of writing (May 2021).

- Devs are still money hungry but a little less so.

- Only fun with friends really.

- Vets still insult you.

- Leaving a game gives you a cool down so it's better than not punishing players for leaving the game because you brought a mori.

- No longer have to restart game to invite new friends.

- This game IS balanced.............. slightly poorly.

- Updates still often bring game breaking bugs but they're usually fixed easily.

- The DBD official discord is still PG. The owner of that server is still a cheater (cheater as in sex not as in game play.)

- The community is less toxic. Still toxic. But less.
Still would only recommend this game if you had friends to play with.
Hold on to your dookie cuz its about to get spooky ;)

IT s a pretty good coop game (If you play survivor)/ a thrilling killing game (As killer)

The perk,the items and addons,the offerings are one reason it makes the game good... Even if the game has a repititive goal Do gens and escape/Kill survivors the perk make each game slightly unique and sometimes funny

A second thing that makes Dead By Daylight good is the variety of survivors and killers to pick from, with each comes differents stats/powers to gain advantage over the ennemy(ies)

There s a third thing that is good with this game but it s not in the game itself... The friends you can play with... A solo game is pretty fun  but friends spice things up with meme builds and funny "Features"(Bugs)
wether it s a basic survivor team or a team of memers,the friends you bring along will make the game funnier

And that's why you should consider buying a such amazing game to play by yourself... or with memers
